node.title: 'Hello, conspiracy theorists. Please, get a life': NT chief's big swipe at 'international trolls' spreading COVID-19 misinformation
node.description: The Northern Territory Chief Minister has delivered a spray against "tinfoil hat-wearing tossers sitting in their parent's basement" who he says are spreading conspiracy theories about the Territory's current COVID-19 outbreak.
node.content:
["Northern Territory's Chief Minister Michael Gunner has used a COVID-19 update press conference to denounce misinformation\u00a0spread by anti-vaxxers and overseas conspiracy theorists who,\u00a0he says, could harm Indigenous Territorians.", "After announcing one new case in the outbreak and the lifting of the hard lockdown for one of the communities considered most at risk earlier this week, Mr\u00a0Gunner addressed what he called a \"huge amount of misinformation spreading online in the last few days\".", "\"I don't really want to lean into the lies that are being spread,\" he said.", "Here's what Mr Gunner said on what he also labelled a \"positive day\" for the current outbreak, which has predominantly impacted Aboriginal Territorians.\u00a0", "", "
Chief Minister Michael\u00a0Gunner launched his speech during a press conference this morning.(ABC News: Che Chorley)
", "
A press conference-turned-impassioned performance
", "For a while now, Mr Gunner has been taking bigger and more colourful\u00a0swipes\u00a0against people \u2014\u00a0including a US senator\u00a0\u2014\u00a0who do not support his government's broad vaccine mandate or against anti-vaxxers more generally.", "Today Mr Gunner took aim at \"insane, unhinged stuff\u00a0spreading online\" that he said\u00a0\"overwhelmingly comes from people who don't live here and know nothing about us\".", "He said that \"99.9\u00a0per cent\u00a0of the 'BS' that is flying around the internet about the Territory is coming from flogs outside the Territory \u2014 mostly America, Canada and the UK\".", "\"People who have nothing better than to really make up lies about us, because their own lives are so small and so sad,\" he added.", "Mr Gunner said bad-faith conspiracy theorists spreading rumours online would not distract from his effort\u00a0\"to protect the oldest continuous living culture on the planet\".", "\"We don't need to pay any more attention to them. We don't need to listen to them,\" he said.", "\"We have tens of thousands of years of history, lore, custom and song to keep alive", "\"And, if anybody thinks we will be distracted or intimidated by tinfoil hat-wearing tossers sitting in their parent's basements in Florida, then you do not know us Territorians.\"", "
Rumours spread about army's involvement in remote communities
", "Mr Gunner identified\u00a0specific instances of misinformation in his speech.", "However, he highlighted \"ridiculous, untrue rumours about the Australian Defence Force's\u00a0involvement\" during the current outbreak.", "\"As we all know, they aren\u2019t carrying weapons. They are carrying fresh food for people,\" he said.", "", "
ADF\u00a0personnel have been assisting with the delivery of food to people in\u00a0the Katherine area.(ABC News: Jesse Thompson)
", "He also addressed what he called \"a lot of crap\" being published on the internet about the Howard Springs quarantine facility.", "\"As we all know, Howard Springs is the gold-standard facility in Australia for COVID quarantine and care.", "", "
Health workers have been on the ground in locked-down communities delivering supplies.(Supplied: NT Health)
", "\"Thousands and thousands of Australians have stayed there, footy stars and rappers have stayed there,\" Mr Gunner said.", "\"It's where our Olympians quarantine. It's Australia's best, which is why it's also used for our First Australians.\"", "Yesterday, an Aboriginal health worker who contracted\u00a0COVID-19 during the current NT outbreak, Luke Ellis,\u00a0strongly criticised\u00a0misinformation being spread online and into remote communities about the vaccine.", "\"To see so much bulls**t being shared around, especially by people that have no love for Indigenous people suddenly [jumping] on the 'genocide' bandwagon when it suits them is f***ed,\" Mr\u00a0Ellis\u00a0wrote in a Twitter thread.", "\"Indigenous people on the ground have continually tried to raise awareness of things affecting our people, including long-term systemic racism.\u00a0To try use us as props now is disgusting.\"", "While Mr Ellis defended the government's evacuations of positive cases and close contacts in remote communities, he said\u00a0there were legitimate criticisms to be made about some aspects of the government's response.", "The government has been criticised for\u00a0delays ensuring at-risk people had access to testing\u00a0and the poor living conditions that made people more vulnerable to the virus when it arrived and make hard lockdowns more difficult.", "
What do people on the ground say?
", "Yesterday the Aboriginal communities in lockdown said misinformation being spread online about their situation was harming them.", "\"We are in lockdown because we're in the biggest fight of our lives,\" read a statement from traditional owners through\u00a0Aboriginal health service Wurli Wurlinjang.", "\"We\u00a0don't appreciate outside people making comments that are untrue.", "\"People on social media saying that our people are being mistreated need to realise their comments are hurting the very people they claim to care about. We want people to respect our privacy and show respect for our feelings.\"", "The Northern Territory's leading Aboriginal organisations, such as\u00a0health groups and land councils, have backed the government's handling of the outbreak and redoubled their efforts this week to combat vaccine hesitancy.", "However, their call,\u00a0repeated this week,\u00a0for the planned resumption of quarantine-free travel to the NT to be paused until\u00a0areas of low vaccination coverage are finally addressed,\u00a0has so far been ignored.", "On the weekend\u00a0the Northern Territory\u00a0government brought forward its plan to end quarantine for arrivals from COVID-19 red zones on December 20.", "", "
What COVID-19 travel insurance doesn't cover you for(Emilia Terzon)
"]
